Children tried to buy beer in a store in the center of Berdsk. They were aggressive and rushed to cars

04 Nov 2019, 14:47

Children tried to buy beer in a store in the center of Berdsk. They were aggressive and rushed to cars
14:47 11/04/2019 0
At 23.30 the children are dressed normally, but there are 5 of them at such a time.
Alina wrote to the Courier.Sreda.Berdsk group on the social network VKontakte:
Hello, yesterday the time went with my daughter from the guests, of course, it’s too late, but decided to take a walk, went to the Dar store on Karl Marx Street, and there a bunch of young children tried to buy beer, arrogant, there people drove by car, they rushed to the car, and children 13 years old, aggressive. At 23.30 the children are dressed normally, but there are 5 of them at such a time.
